responsibilities: Lead project-based teams in a client-facing role to analyze large data sets and derive insights through ML and AI techniques.
Act as the primary architect and technical lead on projects to scope and estimate work streams.
Architect and model technical solutions to meet business requirements.
Serve as a technical expert in client communications.
Participate in design sessions and provision environments.
Coach and lead junior resources on projects.
skills: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face Transformers for model development and experimentation.
Strong understanding of NLP fundamentals, including tokenization, word embeddings, language modeling, sequence labeling, and text generation.
Experience with data processing using LangChain, data embedding using LLMs, Vector databases, and prompt engineering.
Advanced knowledge of relational and non-relational databases (SQL, NoSQL).
Proficient in large-scale distributed systems (Hadoop, Spark, etc.).
Experience with designing and presenting compelling insights using visualization tools (RShiny, R, Python, Tableau, Power BI, D3.js, etc.).
Passion for leading teams and providing both formal and informal mentorship.
Experience with wrangling, exploring, transforming, and analyzing datasets of varying size and complexity.
Knowledgeable of tools and processes to monitor model performance and data quality, including model tuning experience.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, and the ability to engage customers at a business level in addition to a technical level.
Stay current with AI/ML trends and research; be a thought leader in AI area.
analysis: The job responsibilities include leading project-based teams to analyze large data sets using ML and AI techniques, which suggests a focus on advanced AI methodologies. The skills section provides further evidence of working with Generative AI and language models. Specifically, the mention of proficiency in programming languages such as Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face Transformers for model development and experimentation indicates experience with frameworks commonly used for developing language models and generative AI applications. Additionally, the skills list includes a strong understanding of NLP fundamentals, including language modeling and text generation, which are core components of working with language models. The experience with data processing using LangChain, data embedding using LLMs, and prompt engineering further confirms the involvement with language models and generative AI. Overall, the job clearly involves working with Generative AI and language models.
